title: The Boss of Her
description: Trask Corporation had holdings all around the world that manager Annie Foster never expected t have anything to do with - much like she never expected to have anything to do with the its head honcho, one incredibly sexy Cole Trask, despite how he haunted her spanko dreams and fantasies. Little did she know that Trask himself had been biding his time, waiting not-so-patiently and watching her, wanting what she had but respecting the fact that she was married - if even unhappily. Until he found the perfect reason to involve her in a delicate little business maneuver he was planning - and he intended that it evolve into something much more than just a business trip, especially if she spent as much time over his lap as he figured she was going to!
author: Carolyn Faulkner
